wordGroup: aplastic anemia [医]再生障碍性贫血
iron deficiency anemia 缺铁性贫血
pernicious anemia n. 恶性贫血
sickle cell anemia [医]镰状细胞性贫血
megaloblastic anemia 巨成红细胞性贫血

sentences.en: Poor manganese may cause dwarfism, anemia, bronchial asthma, Parkinson's disease, child amentia, tumor, et al.
sentences.cn: 锰缺乏可引起侏儒症、贫血、支气管哮喘、帕金森病、儿童智力低下、肿瘤等。

sentences.en: The differential diagnoses include myelophthisis and aplastic anemia.
sentences.cn: 鉴别诊断包括骨髓痨和再生障碍性贫血。

sentences.en: Heritable mutations of ALAS2 gene are responsible for the human X-linked sideroblastic anemia.
sentences.cn: ALAS2基因的可遗传突变是人类X连锁铁粒幼细胞性贫血的原因。
